about_the_game:
PAPER BLEEDS, the name says it all.

Paper blood will be spilled, dead bodies will fall and linger and piles of recycled paper figurines will rise.

Also you can now listen to the Original Soundtrack of Squareface and enjoy it while you do other thing you like doing.
detailed_description:
PAPER BLEEDS, the name says it all.

Paper blood will be spilled, dead bodies will fall and linger and piles of recycled paper figurines will rise.

Also you can now listen to the Original Soundtrack of Squareface and enjoy it while you do other thing you like doing.
legal_notice: Squareface uses the Unreal® Engine.  Unreal® is a trademark or registered trademark of Epic Games, Inc. in the United States of America and elsewhere. Unreal® Engine, Copyright 1998 - 2016, Epic Games, Inc.  All rights reserved.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.10.5
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Intel
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound device
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.11.5
  • Processor: 2.4GHz Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound device

name: Squareface - Paper Bleeds

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: 2.4GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB NVIDIA GeForce 9800 / ATI
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 3 Ghz Quad-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB NVIDIA 460 / AMD Radeon 5870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound device

short_description: Paper blood will be spilled, dead bodies will fall and linger and piles of recycled paper figurines will rise.
